page.syntax: Bytes_Written as N = Write(C String[,N Length])

argument.name: Bytes_Written
argument.description: The number of bytes written to the file.

argument.name: String
argument.description: A variable or expression containing character data.

argument.name: Length
argument.description: Optional. Default = all. The number of bytes to write.

page.discussion: The <FILE>.WRITE() method transfers the contents of a Text string to the location of the current file pointer in the open file referenced by the object pointer, <FILE>. The optional Number_of_Bytes parameter specifies the number of bytes (or characters) from Text that will be written to the file.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script creates a defaults file with 4 groups of 4 characters, VAR1 .. VAR4.
section.example: file_pointer = file.create("C:\a5\defaults.txt", FILE_RW_EXCLUSIVE) for i = 1 TO 4 file_pointer.write("VAR" + ltrim( str(i) ) ) next i file_pointer.flush() file_pointer.close()
